TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TaskDeleteCheck(object sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties creationProperties, string executor);
.class public auto ansi sealed TaskDeleteCheck extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TaskDeleteCheck(sender As Object, taskId As Guid, creationProperties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, executor As String)
public delegate void TaskDeleteCheck(System::Object ^ sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ creationProperties, System::String ^ executor);

Docs.param: The GUID of the workflow task ID.
An object that contains the properties of the workflow task when it was created.
The identifier (ID) of the user who is executing the task.
Docs.summary: Specifies a delegate that is used to check if a workflow task has been deleted.
